data.title: Biography of King Christian IX of Denmark 1818-1906
meta_keywords: Marriage of the future King Edward VII and Alexandra
King Christian IX of Denmark Dies
data.meta_description: Biography of King Christian IX of Denmark 1818-1906 including his birth, marriages, death and life events, life events of his siblings, and his ancestry to five generations, royal ancestors and royal descendants.
data.text:
On 26 Jan 1810 [his father] Friedrich Wilhelm Glücksburg Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg 1785-1831 (age 25) and [his mother] Louise Caroline Hesse-Kassel Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg (age 20) were married. He the son of Friedrich Karl Ludwig Oldenburg I Duke Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck 1757-1816 (age 52) and Friederike Schlieben Duchess Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck. She a great granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 24 Apr 1816 [his grandfather] Friedrich Karl Ludwig Oldenburg I Duke Schleswig-Holstein-Sonderburg-Beck 1757-1816 (age 58) died at Wellingsbüttel Manor. His son [his father] Friedrich Wilhelm Glücksburg Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg 1785-1831 (age 31) succeeded Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg. [his mother] Louise Caroline Hesse-Kassel Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg (age 26) by marriage Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg.

On 08 Apr 1818 King Christian IX of Denmark was born to Friedrich Wilhelm Glücksburg Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg 1785-1831 (age 33) and Louise Caroline Hesse-Kassel Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg (age 28). He a great x 2 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 17 Feb 1831 [his father] Friedrich Wilhelm Glücksburg Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg 1785-1831 (age 46) died. His son [his brother] Karl Glücksburg Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg 1812-1878 (age 18) succeeded Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg.

On 26 May 1842 King Christian IX of Denmark (age 24) and Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 24) were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Denmark. He the son of Friedrich Wilhelm Glücksburg Duke Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg 1785-1831 and Louise Caroline Hesse-Kassel Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg (age 52). They were second cousins. He a great x 2 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. She a great x 2 granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 03 Jun 1843 [his son] Frederick VIII King Denmark 1843-1912 was born to King Christian IX of Denmark (age 25) and [his wife] Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 25). He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. Coefficient of inbreeding 2.84%.

On 28 Jan 1844 [his brother-in-law] Friedrich Wilhelm Hesse-Kassel (age 23) and Alexandra Nikolaevna Holstein Gottorp Romanov (age 18) were married at St Petersburg. She died in childbirth seven months later. He a great x 2 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. She a great x 4 granddaughter of King George I of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 01 Dec 1844 [his daughter] Alexandra Glücksburg Queen Consort England was born to King Christian IX of Denmark (age 26) and [his wife] Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 27). She a great x 3 granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. Coefficient of inbreeding 2.84%.

On 24 Dec 1845 [his son] George I King Greece 1845-1913 was born to King Christian IX of Denmark (age 27) and [his wife] Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 28). He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. Coefficient of inbreeding 2.84%.

On 26 Nov 1847 [his daughter] Dagmar aka Maria Feodrovna Glücksburg was born to King Christian IX of Denmark (age 29) and [his wife] Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 30). She a great x 3 granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. Coefficient of inbreeding 2.84%.

On 26 May 1853 [his brother-in-law] Friedrich Wilhelm Hesse-Kassel (age 32) and Princess Anna of Prussia (age 17) were married. He a great x 2 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. She a great x 4 granddaughter of King George I of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 29 Sep 1853 [his daughter] Thyra Glücksburg Duchess Cumberland and Teviotdale was born to King Christian IX of Denmark (age 35) and [his wife] Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 36). She a great x 3 granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. Coefficient of inbreeding 2.84%.

On 27 Oct 1858 [his son] Prince Valdemar Glücksburg was born to King Christian IX of Denmark (age 40) and [his wife] Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 41). He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. Coefficient of inbreeding 2.84%.

On 10 Mar 1863 [his son-in-law] King Edward VII of the United Kingdom (age 21) and [his daughter] Alexandra Glücksburg Queen Consort England (age 18) were married at St George's Chapel, Windsor Castle [Map]. She the daughter of King Christian IX of Denmark 1818-1906 (age 44) and Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 45). He the son of Prince Albert Saxe Coburg Gotha and Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom (age 43). They were third cousin once removed. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 15 Nov 1863 King Christian IX of Denmark (age 45) succeeded IX King Denmark.

In 1865 King Christian IX of Denmark (age 46) was appointed 744th Knight of the Garter by Queen Victoria of the United Kingdom (age 45)..

On 09 Nov 1866 [his son-in-law] Tsar Alexander III of Russia (age 21) and [his daughter] Dagmar aka Maria Feodrovna Glücksburg (age 18) were married. She the daughter of King Christian IX of Denmark 1818-1906 (age 48) and Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 49). He a great x 5 grandson of King George I of Great Britain and Ireland. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 13 Mar 1867 [his mother] Louise Caroline Hesse-Kassel Duchess Schleswig Holstein Sonderburg Glücksburg (age 77) died.

On 15 Oct 1867 [his son] George I King Greece 1845-1913 (age 21) and [his daughter-in-law] Olga Constantinovna Holstein Gottorp Romanov Queen Consort Greece (age 16) were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Greece. He the son of King Christian IX of Denmark 1818-1906 (age 49) and Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 50). He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland. She a great x 5 granddaughter of King George I of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 28 Jul 1869 [his son] Frederick VIII King Denmark 1843-1912 (age 26) and [his daughter-in-law] Louise of Sweden Queen Consort Denmark (age 17) were married. He the son of King Christian IX of Denmark 1818-1906 (age 51) and Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 51). He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 22 Dec 1878 [his son-in-law] Ernest Augustus Hanover 3rd Duke Cumberland and Teviotdale 1845-1923 (age 33) and [his daughter] Thyra Glücksburg Duchess Cumberland and Teviotdale (age 25) were married. She by marriage Duchess Cumberland and Teviotdale. She the daughter of King Christian IX of Denmark 1818-1906 (age 60) and Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 61). He the son of George V King Hanover 1819-1878 and Marie Saxe Altenburg Queen Consort Hanover. They were fourth cousins. He a great grandson of King George III of Great Britain and Ireland. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 14 Oct 1884 [his brother-in-law] Friedrich Wilhelm Hesse-Kassel (age 63) died.

On 20 Oct 1885 [his son] Prince Valdemar Glücksburg (age 26) and [his daughter-in-law] Princess Marie Orléans (age 20) were married in a civil ceremony at Château d'Eu [Map]. He the son of King Christian IX of Denmark 1818-1906 (age 67) and Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 68). He a great x 3 grandson of King George II of Great Britain and Ireland.

On 28 Jul 1895 [his sister-in-law] Marie Luise Charlotte Hesse-Kassel (age 81) died.

On 29 Sep 1898 [his wife] Queen Louise Hesse-Kassel of Denmark (age 81) died.

On 18 Jul 1899 [his former sister-in-law] Auguste Sophie Friederike Hesse-Kassel (age 75) died.

On 29 Jan 1906 King Christian IX of Denmark (age 87) died. His son [his son] Frederick VIII King Denmark 1843-1912 (age 62) succeeded VIII King Denmark. [his daughter-in-law] Louise of Sweden Queen Consort Denmark (age 54) by marriage Queen Consort Denmark.
